overview: A cinematic love letter to Italian Genre films. A Lance Madzey Film. Written by Dick Grunert (Adventure Time, The Trap). Starring Michael Champion (Campbell). Michael Campbell (born in Anderson, Indiana) started his public career as a singer, songwriter and musician in Detroit. In 1967 with a short-lived band called 'The Abstract Reality', a 45 rpm single Love Burns Like A Fire Inside was released.
title: The Woman with Centipede Eyes
